name: Brian
description:
Do you like rubber ducks?  Then this is the game for you!

Brian is a 3D Action Platformer mixed with some other spicy stuff.  The game consists of two modes, Story mode (Singleplayer) and Party mode (Multiplayer).  Since the game is currently it's really early in development multiplayer is currently unavailable. 

As mentioned earlier the game is in its early stages of development but there is a story planned!

  • Experimental Story: You are hired as a Beta tester to test out a program that a well-known company called I.R.C.A has been building for years now. Test out the basic movement, test your skills, and learn more about the actions and movements you can do. This story also functions as a tutorial.
  • Main Story: Play as Brian and discover the world, and uncover the big secret that lies in the Breezy Isles 

1.) Click the download button (duh) 

2.) Wait for the download to complete 

3.) Open the file

4.) Extract the file

5.) Open the file again

6.) Open Brian.exe 

...and done!

If you have any complications with downloading the game don't be afraid and ask me on the Discord  server

The game is a really ambitious project that I have been working on for over a year now and it's the first game I've ever made so leaving any suggestion or playing it would mean a lot. 

P.S: This Brian may or may not be related to this Brian
